title: [Hebrew] or Wisdome and prudence exhibited in a sermon before the right honourable the Lord Chief Justice Rainsford, and the Lord Chief Justice North. In their late western circuit. By Tho. Tanner, Rector of Brightstone in Hants.
author: Tanner, Thomas, 1630-1682.
publisher: printed for William Keblewhite bookseller at Newport in the Isle of Wight,
notes: Beginning of title in Hebrew characters.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
